version_description:
[Pixel Art Maker - 8bit Painter Ver.1.9.5 new features]
* Quick zoom out
* Grid ON / OFF
* Changes to new design of button icon

## Quick zoom out
When the enlarged canvas to tap with two fingers, you can return quickly to original canvas size.

---

If you like 8bit Painter, would you mind taking a moment to rate it? When you give us your rating, We are very happy!

Thanks for your support!

[Pixel art editor - 8bit Painter Ver 1.9.6 New features]
* Number of works that can be saved has been increased to 150.
* Changed the output image size.

Image size that can be output has been changed. 1 dot size of will be same size in all of canvas.

# Size of 1 dot on the output image
* S : 1dot = 8px
* M : 1dot = 16px
* L : 1dot = 24px

# Output image size
## 16 dots
* S : 128 x 128 px
* M : 256 x 256 px
* L : 384 x 384 px

## 32 dots
* S : 256 x 256 px
* M : 512 x 512 px
* L : 768 x 768 px

## 48 dots
* S : 384 x 384 px
* M : 768 x 768 px
* L : 1152 x 1152 px

## 64 dots
* S : 512 x 512 px
* M : 1024 x 1024 px
* L : 1536 x 1536 px


---

If you like 8bit Painter, would you mind taking a moment to rate it? When you give us your rating, We are very happy!

Thanks for your support!

[Pixel Art Maker - 8bit Painter Ver 1.9.7 updates]
* Added support for French and Portuguese.
* You can view artworks that have been posted to Facebook.
* The interval of the grid display has been changed to 8 dots.

If you like 8bit Painter, would you mind taking a moment to rate it? When you give us your rating, We are very happy!

Thanks for your support!

[8bit Painter Ver 1.9.8 Update]
Changed output image size.

## 16 x 16 Canvas
* 256 px
* 128 px
* 16 px

## 32 x 32 Canvas
* 512 px
* 256 px
* 32 px

## 48 x 48 Canvas
* 768 px
* 384 px
* 48 px

## 64 x 64 Canvas
* 1024 px
* 512 px
* 64 px

If you like 8bit Painter, would you mind taking a moment to rate it? When you give us your rating, We are very happy!

Thanks for your support!

[8bit Painter Ver 1.9.9 New features]
* Added 96 x 96 canvas (iPhone 6 or later)
* Added "bulk delete function" in Custom color palette

If you like 8bit Painter, would you mind taking a moment to rate it? When you give us your rating, We are very happy!

Thanks for your support!

[Ver 2.0.0 New features]
* Added 128 x 128 canvas (iPhone 5s or later)
* UI design was renewed
* Up to 300 works can be saved
* Canvas rendering has been speeded up
* Compatible with iPad

If you like 8bit Painter, would you mind taking a moment to rate it? When you give us your rating, We are very happy!

Thanks for your support!
Changed contact URL on “About the App” screen.

[Ver 2.0.2 Update]
· Modify some text in the application
· Supports PNG image upload to Dropbox, iCloud, Google Drive

[New features]
# Flip horizontal
Flip canvas horizontally.

# Display number of works
Display number of works in Gallery screen.

# Canvas clear
"Canvas clear" was added to the menu on Canvas screen.
